chart.name: chart.customers.by.country.bar
chart.title: Customers by country
chart.dataset: SELECT count(_partner.id) AS partners, _country.name AS country_name FROM base_partner AS _partner JOIN base_partner_address AS _partner_address ON _partner_address.partner = _partner.id AND _partner_address.is_default_addr = true JOIN base_address AS _address ON _address.id = _partner_address.address JOIN base_country AS _country ON _country.id = _address.addressL7country WHERE _partner.is_customer = true GROUP BY _country.name

chart.name: chart.customers.by.industrySector.bar
chart.title: Customers by Industry Sector
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_partner, industrySector.name as _industry_sector FROM base_partner as self JOIN base_industry_sector as industrySector on industrySector.id = self.industry_sector WHERE self.is_contact != true and self.is_customer = true GROUP BY _industry_sector ORDER BY _industry_sector

chart.name: chart.suppliers.by.country.bar
chart.title: Suppliers by country
chart.dataset: SELECT count(_partner.id) AS partners, _country.name AS country_name FROM base_partner AS _partner JOIN base_partner_address AS _partner_address ON _partner_address.partner = _partner.id AND _partner_address.is_default_addr = true JOIN base_address AS _address ON _address.id = _partner_address.address JOIN base_country AS _country ON _country.id = _address.addressL7country WHERE _partner.is_supplier = true GROUP BY _country.name

chart.name: chart.partner.prospects.by.country
chart.title: Prospects by country
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_partner, addressCountry.name as _address_country FROM base_partner as self LEFT JOIN base_partner_address AS partner_address ON partner_address.partner = self.id AND partner_address.is_default_addr = true LEFT JOIN base_address as baseAddress ON baseAddress.id=partner_address.address LEFT JOIN base_country AS addressCountry ON addressCountry.id=baseAddress.addressl7country WHERE self.is_prospect = true AND is_contact=false GROUP BY _address_country ORDER BY _address_country

chart.name: chart.partner.prospects.by.industrySector
chart.title: Prospects by Industry Sector
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) as _total_partner, _partnerCategory.name as _industry_sector FROM Partner self LEFT JOIN self.partnerCategory _partnerCategory WHERE self.isProspect = true AND self.isContact = false group by _partnerCategory.name

chart.name: chart.customers.with.first.sale.order
chart.title: New customers with first sale order
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) as customers, ' ' as title FROM Partner self WHERE self.isCustomer = true AND EXISTS ( FROM SaleOrder so WHERE so.clientPartner = self AND so.confirmationDateTime IS NOT NULL AND DATE(so.confirmationDateTime) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND (so.statusSelect = 3 OR so.statusSelect = 4) AND NOT EXISTS( FROM SaleOrder so2 WHERE so2.clientPartner = self AND so2.confirmationDateTime IS NOT NULL AND so2 != so AND so2.confirmationDateTime < so.confirmationDateTime AND (so2.statusSelect = 3 OR so2.statusSelect = 4)))
